challenges.title: Task Manager
challenges.description: Create a Task Manager application that allows users to create, update, and delete tasks. Use any front-end libraries of your choice. Create your API.
appRequirements: Create a new task
Edit an existing task
Delete a task
Mark a task as completed
Filter tasks by status (completed, incomplete)
Sort tasks by priority or due date
Set due dates for tasks
Display tasks in a list or grid view
Implement user authentication

challenges.title: E-commerce Store
challenges.description: Create an E-commerce Store application that allows users to browse products, add items to a shopping cart, and complete the checkout process. Use any front-end libraries of your choice. Create your API.
appRequirements: Display a list of products
Implement search functionality to find products
Allow users to add items to a shopping cart
Calculate the total price of items in the shopping cart
Provide a checkout process with payment integration
Allow users to create accounts and login
Implement user authentication and authorization
Manage user orders and order history
Admin panel to manage products and orders

challenges.title: Social Media Platform
challenges.description: Create a Social Media Platform application that allows users to create profiles, post updates, follow other users, and interact with posts. Use any front-end libraries of your choice. Create your API.
appRequirements: User registration and login
Create user profiles with profile pictures
Post updates and share content
Follow other users and view their posts
Like, comment, and share posts
Implement user notifications
Search functionality to find users and posts
Implement user privacy settings
Implement real-time updates using websockets
User messaging or chat functionality

challenges.title: Recipe Sharing App
challenges.description: Create a Recipe Sharing application that allows users to share and discover recipes. Use any front-end libraries of your choice. Create your API.
appRequirements: Create and edit recipes with ingredients and instructions
Categorize recipes by cuisine or dietary preferences
Allow users to search for recipes by ingredients or keywords
Implement a rating and review system for recipes
User profiles to save favorite recipes
Share recipes on social media platforms
Provide a comment section for each recipe
Implement user authentication and authorization
Option to create private or public recipes

challenges.title: Job Board
challenges.description: Create a Job Board application that allows users to post job listings, search for jobs, and apply for positions. Use any front-end libraries of your choice. Create your API.
appRequirements: Employer accounts to post job listings
Job search functionality with filters
Allow users to upload resumes and cover letters
Apply for jobs with a single click
Implement user profiles and job preferences
User notifications for job application status
Admin panel to manage job listings and user accounts
Email notifications for job application updates
Implement user authentication and authorization

challenges.title: Event Management System
challenges.description: Create an Event Management System application that allows users to create, manage, and RSVP to events. Use any front-end libraries of your choice. Create your API.
appRequirements: Create and edit event details (title, date, time, location, description)
Allow users to RSVP to events
Display upcoming events and event details
Implement event search functionality
User profiles with event attendance history
Admin panel to manage events and user accounts
Allow users to create private or public events
Send event reminders and notifications
Implement user authentication and authorization
